attributes.additional_details: I am hopping to set up a Sponcerd Bike Ride, as a group or solo, to raise £5000! The money that is raised is for a distributor, for the community! The group, for the Sponcerd Bike Ride, is 30 miles, there and back! The Bike Ride will be from Warminster to Bradford On Avon back to Warminster, I would like for you give give your support, to help raise the funds!

rejection.details: The e-petitions is not a place for general advertising, however worthy the cause.  Petitions should be clear as to what action the Government is being requested to take.
